channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Tree roots causing trip hazard on pavement, 5th January
item.description:
Most of this road has dangerous trip hazards from roots of trees. I have fallen and tripped many times. Also slippy in places from tree sap.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 63, Stanway Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham

item.title: Water consistently running down this road. Now lethal as turned to ice, 4th January
item.description:
There is water constantly running down this road and has been for long time (over a few years) and nothing is ever done to sort it. There is a blocked culvert causing it. The water running down the road has turned to ice over the last few days and is now extremely dangerous. Please could this culvert be unblocked and short term the road be gritted as a priority.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Langley Road, Winchcombe, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same

item.title: Abandoned metal sign on Honeybourne path, 4th January
item.description:
Following the closure of part of the Honeybourne cycle/pedestrian path several weeks ago, the sign used has not been collected. It is on the path which crosses the bridge over Swindon Road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 143, Swindon Road, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham

item.title: Six abandoned road signs on verge within 100 metres, 4th January
item.description:
Opposite the b4079 turning on the a435 and back towards teddington hands. If you come from teddington hands towards cleeve there are 6 road signs within about 100m on the left hand side just before the right turn to aschurch.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A435, Oxenton, Tewkesbury

item.title: Public footpath no longer visible or maintained., 4th January
item.description:
The public footpath that runs either side of Syringa Farm. One side runs NE from the farm and joins another public footpath. The other side runs SW from Syrings Farm over a field and to the corner of Hently Bank Community Woods.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sandy Pluck Lane, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury

item.title: Fairview Road puddles since resurfacing, 4th January
item.description:
This road was resurfaced in November. Multiple drains are blocked with the debris from resurfacing, and some areas have not been laid properly and now pool water. the drainage channel outside machine Mart is completely blocked and a lake forms here

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 93, Fairview Road, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham

item.title: Inadequate street lighting in Mill Street Prestbury Cheltenham, 3rd January
item.description:
I was walking up from the Burgage at 6.00pm on Friday 19th December and noticed one street light in the whole street which is very long. When I was nearly outside the Plough Inn I literally could not see in front of my face..it was so dark that I fell heavily ..I badly skinned both my knees and bruised my left leg..they are still healing. I was going to see St Mary's Choir but the garden was far too crowded and I was shaken up. I went home with my dog and didn't leave the house over the weekend. The street lighting is totally inadequate outside the public house..their garden was well lit where the choir was but there were far too many people there. I would like you to survey this street and report your findings to me...it could have been more serious if I had fell into the street with passing traffic. It was witnessed by my friend at that time and it happened at 18.10pm.. Hazel Bruckel

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Cromwell Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
